backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with types for products, listings, retailers, applications, and related domain models.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variants for global theming.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring ThemeProvider, error boundary, cart provider, router, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/DangerZone: Admin card enabling full system wipe with confirmation dialog, success state, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ListingEdi: Dialog for creating or editing listings with price, stock, status, and promo configuration.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating or editing products with category selection, image upload, and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerEd: Dialog form for creating or editing a retailer, handling validation, opening hours, and submission to backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerHo: Editor for weekly opening hours and holiday overrides, allowing toggling days, adjusting times, and managing holiday entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Searchable dropdown select component using a popover and command list with filtering and option selection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Displays a destructive alert indicating admin backend functionality is not implemented.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Full-screen loading overlay shown during Internet Identity login or actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity auth flow with error handling and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for collecting and submitting initial user profile details with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that restricts children to admins, showing an access-denied card when the caller is not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Gatekeeping component requiring user approval, offering approval request flow for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Requires authenticated identity, prompting login when unauthenticated and rendering children otherwise.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component with error fallback rendering branded placeholders when the source fails to load.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that catches rendering, runtime, and unhandled promise errors and displays an error screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: UI screen that shows error details and provides actions to reload the page or return home.
frontend/src/components/shop/cart/CartPr: Context provider managing cart items with localStorage persistence and utility functions.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Hook providing search, category filtering, and sorting utilities for catalog items.
Footer displaying copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
Header with navigation, cart indicator, login button, and mobile menu for the shop interface.
Page layout wrapping content with header, footer, and dialogs for auth, profile, and town setup.
frontend/src/components/towns/DefaultTow: Dialog prompting users to select and set their default town with validation and async submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Hooks for admins to list all orders and update order status with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Hook fetching the global shop catalogue using the backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list and create categories, merging backend and predefined frequent categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureDefaultTownO: A hook that checks default town membership and logs a placeholder for future auto‑assignment of 'Osizweni'.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity state handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting product listings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNomaYini.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to list customer orders, fetch order details, and create new orders with delivery and payment options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating products, with cache invalidation across related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains approval- and admin‑related query hooks for checking and setting user approval and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailerPortal.ts: Hooks for fetching the current retailer, its inventory, and its orders for the retailer portal.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailers.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting retailers via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleApplications.t: Defines driver and shopper application types and hooks for querying and managing role‑based applications; many driver methods are placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopperApplication: Hooks for fetching the caller's shopper application and status and submitting new shopper applications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: Contains a mutation hook for system wipe functionality, currently unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useTownMembership.ts: Provides town‑membership hooks for querying and modifying default and favorite towns, all currently disabled or unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useTowns.ts: Defines town types and hooks for listing, creating, updating, and removing towns, with backend functions not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, including caller and specific‑user variants.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that initializes React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriversPag: Admin UI for viewing, approving, and rejecting driver applications using role‑application hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Admin UI for viewing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting product-to-retailer listings with dialogs and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin interface to list orders, filter by status, view details, and update order statuses with optional assignment fields.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPickupPoin: Empty placeholder page for managing pickup points.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for searching, viewing, creating, and editing products in the global catalogue.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting retailers with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: System settings page with placeholders for future configurations and a danger‑zone system wipe component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminShoppersPa: Admin workflow for reviewing, approving, or rejecting personal shopper applications with detailed dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTownApplic: Informational page explaining that town membership applications are no longer required.
UI for admins to view, create, edit, and remove towns with form handling and tabbed active/removed lists.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Admin dashboard showing stats and allowing approval or rejection of users.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page with item quantity controls, removal, and subtotal calculation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CataloguePage.ts: Product catalogue with search, listing filters, and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form handling delivery, payment options, order submission, and success flow.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverDashboardP: Empty placeholder file for the driver dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Page presenting application options for drivers, shoppers, and pickup points with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Empty placeholder file for master admin role applications page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays a list of the user's orders with statuses, totals, and navigation to order details, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyTownsPage.tsx: Allows users to view and manage their default and favorite towns, including adding and removing towns with loading and confirmation states.
Shows detailed information for a specific order, including status, delivery and payment methods, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Empty placeholder file for product detail functionality.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Renders a marketing-style landing page introducing the platform and its features, with optional navigation for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Empty placeholder file for requesting new products.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Empty placeholder file for browsing a retailer’s product catalog.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerDashboar: Provides retailer-specific dashboard showing retailer info, inventory, and listing statuses with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Empty placeholder file for listing retailers.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerOrderTra: Displays retailer order tracking with status badges, loading/error states, and a table of orders fetched from the retailer portal.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Shows the user's shopper application status with badges, messages, and a prompt to apply if none exists.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperApplicati: Form page for submitting a shopper application including personal info, selfie upload, validation, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperDashboard: Empty placeholder page for shopper dashboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Empty placeholder page for listing towns or suburbs.
frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx: Implements hash-based routing, mapping routes to pages with auth/admin guards where required.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Provides a safe helper to extract a direct URL from an ExternalBlob with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Utilities to convert files to byte arrays and validate image files by type and size.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utilities for formatting, parsing, and validating ZAR currency values.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Helpers for selecting primary/all product images, creating safe URLs, and checking image slot limits.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds deployment-safe URLs for public assets using Vite's BASE_URL handling.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports the list and type of South African provinces.
frontend/src/utils/themeAssets.ts: Defines centralized theme asset URLs for branding using publicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats IC timestamps into readable date or date-time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing scope, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features with metadata.
